questions.question: Which of the following platforms can be used to display the sensor data sent via HTTP protocol?

explanations.a: ThingSpeak is a widely used IoT platform that can display sensor data.
explanations.b: Google Drive is a cloud storage service, not an IoT platform.
explanations.c: Microsoft Word is a word processor, not related to IoT data display.
explanations.d: Notepad is a text editor, not an IoT platform.

questions.question: What is the HTTP method used to send data to an IoT platform in this experiment?

explanations.a: The POST method is used to send data to a server or IoT platform.
explanations.b: GET is used to request data from a server, not to send data.
explanations.c: PUT is used to update existing data on a server.
explanations.d: DELETE is used to remove data from the server.
